attributes.action: not include motorcycles in any future congestion related road pricing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As motorcycles do not cause,in any way,congestion they should be exempt from any future congestion related road pricing plans and should not be expected to pay at all.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MCNroadpricing/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
